attributes.description:
Please visit www.cbkmotors.co.za for a virtual tour of this car as well as our online showroom. You can also click the Finance Option to do a remote finance application and get pre-approved on the vehicle of your choice.  
The Hyundai ix35 is built for both comfort and exploring! This SUV is perfect for family, reliable and robust! She is exceptionally is clean and mechanically sound with a Full-service history with features that include; Reverse Camera, Blue tooth, Air Control, Multi-Function Steering, Mag wheels and much more. We take things a little more seriously at CBK Motors we do a full ABC Assessment on all vehicles. A: Body for dents, scratches and scuff marks. B: Overall Mechanical check over and C: Cosmetic and interior assessment for your buying pleasure! E&O 
COME AND VIEW!
Finance Can be Arranged! 
Trade-ins Accepted!
Office: 010 449 3410 
David : 067 131 6474

attributes.description: Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Motus Toyota Bedfordview.

attributes.description:
The boss is here and is putting everyone in their place: the BMW X5. Its presence is clear for all to see – upright, powerful, and elegant. The mighty one-piece double kidney grille hints at what will happen when it takes a deep breath.

The X5 is an extremely versatile car and can cover big distances with ease, making it ideal for families who do lots of travelling.

The interior is beautifully built and it’s also an ergonomic masterpiece that offers plenty of head and legroom

All vehicles quality checked by our highly qualified BMW technicians, to ensure your vehicle is as good as new. Contact one of our very friendly and highly professional sales staff members to tailor your deal on this vehicle today! Finance can be arranged. Test drives and trade ins welcome!
